resources.string: Rover\'s predicted final position and direction
Click the buttons to input new movements or erase one.

Welcome! 

 The MarsRover app allows to send instructions to the Mars Rover to turn or move in a specific direction. The robot attempts to move as indicated inside its plateau and returns the final coordinates as result. 

 In the next screen you will have to first configure the initial conditions of the Rover: 
· The width and height of the plateau where the Rover will move. 
· The initial coordinates where the Rover will be. 

 In the second screen you can input how the Rover will move through the plateau. Don't worry! It's programmed to not fall off the plateau. 

 Click "Start" to begin the control of the Mars Rover!
